Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: 'I was going to make the introduction myself. How rude of me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: 'I just wanted to tell everyone the truth.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: 'All the truth, pedantic, dirty, hypocritical truth... Right here!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'Warning. Warning. Main wings damaged. Fuel leaking!'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "(Dammit! I can't stop him if I don't attack!!)", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Watanabe, do you think they can be forgiven?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: "You watched my son die in front of you. Aren't you his best friend? Aren't you going to fight for him? Can you forgive these bastards?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "You saw that list! They're trying to flee into space, leaving the soldiers—who are fighting with their lives—behind to die! No honor, no graves!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Out of my way! I will reveal their dirty deeds and show the truth to everyone!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe's voice feels like fuel and lubricating oil. He shouted with unrestricted anger."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You are not the only one who lost someone important!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I have never forgotten Bruce!! And my other brothers in arms! I remember them, every single one of them!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'January 22nd, 2161. The northern defense was breached by Corrupted due to a mistake of the local army. Mercenary squad "Oasis" was hired to make up for the lack of troops.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Oasis Squad persisted in the snow for a week and rescued all the civilians in a church. Fifty-two KIA.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "That's all the record they had in Babylonia's system.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Albert, we call him green-head. Garzah, always had mint leaves with him. Coates, he came from Islay Islands, just like you and Bruce…', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No matter what... I cannot give a reasonable explanation for that list. But what I know is...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Those people evacuated to Babylonia... The first batch of them were researchers of anti-Punishing technology.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The second batch is... It may sound like an excuse to you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But they're necessary for regulating society and spreading culture after the war ends.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We live in a dark era, but we need someone to look to the future.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: '...What about my hope...? There are tens of thousands of soldiers like me, abandoned, stranded on the ground. What about our hope?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Maybe you're right, young man. But I have made my decision.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'He said you were a great pilot. He looked up to you. He became a mercenary because he wanted to become one like you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'He never hated anyone, even after the war took his family.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "My biggest regret... Is that I couldn't save him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Bruce was unique. But his legacy will go on. I will never stop fighting on this land, even just for his sake.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm sorry, but I have to stop you!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Alright. Come on then, kid!! I've never lost to anyone in the air!!!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What a pity, you never got to fight Bruce!', 4: '1'}
